name: A Quiet Afternoon
description:
There is something nearby. Will you listen?

Crawley is a great place to live.

West of Hayden and New Walk, despite its modern renovations and newer housing development in the south-east, the town has maintained its connection to nature and quiet rural charm. Local amenities include a nature trail, cinema, clinic, and library.

Its proximity to the city (a twenty-minute drive) makes it ideal for commuters.

Notes

1. Headphones recommended. Sudden noises occur.
2. There are three different endings.
3. Game may take a minute to load due to size.
